description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into swamp. The user can turn their body into a bottomless swamp that can absorb and store objects and people.

users.circumstances: Caribou ate the fruit at some point before arriving at Sabaody Archipelago

abilityReveals.description: Caribou can transform his body into a muddy, swamp-like substance to escape confinement and trap others.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caribou escapes from the barrel Franky trapped him in by transforming into mud and slithering away, then uses his swamp body to trap the mermaids who released him.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Logia weakness - can be hit when not transformed or by Haki users
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can absorb and store people and objects in bottomless swamp body
strengths.description: Caribou can trap victims inside his swamp body, making him particularly dangerous to defenseless targets like mermaids.

strengths.strength: Logia intangibility allows escape from physical restraints
strengths.description: Caribou escaped from being trapped in a sealed barrel by transforming into swamp.
